meanings.sent1: The anticorrosion paint protected the metal from rusting.
meanings.sent2: The anticorrosion coating on the bridge helped it withstand the salty air.
meanings.sent3: The anticorrosion spray was like a shield against the rust monster.
meanings.sent4: Her anticorrosion methods were a fortress against the relentless attack of rust.
meanings.sent5: The anticorrosion treatment formed an invisible barrier against decay.

meanings.definition: The act or process of preventing or inhibiting corrosion.
meanings.sent1: Regular maintenance includes anticorrosion to keep the machinery in top condition.
meanings.sent2: The anticorrosion of the pipes was crucial to prevent leaks.
meanings.sent3: The anticorrosion process felt like a magical spell cast on the metal.
meanings.sent4: The anticorrosion efforts were the unsung heroes in preserving the old ship.
meanings.sent5: The anticorrosion work was like a shield protecting the metal from decay.
